patthana15.83:4.1: Saraṇaṃ hīnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.83:5.1: Araṇaṃ majjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naaraṇo namajjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.83:5.2: Araṇaṃ majjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasaraṇo namajjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.83:5.3: Hetuyā dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana15.83:6.1: Araṇaṃ paṇītaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo napaṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
